DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate whether dietary supplement , coenzyme Q10 ( CoQ10 ) , improve muscle symptom , muscle ache , pain , cramp , and/or weakness , experienced individual use statin medication .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial CoQ10 Mild-to-Moderate Statin-Associated Muscle Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: This study recruit individual muscle symptom use statin . During first part study , volunteer give statin medication see muscle symptom return . Those experience muscle symptom statin rechallenge invite continue second part trial , participant randomly assign receive either CoQ10 placebo ( sugar pill ) take statin medication . We hypothesize receive CoQ10 experience improvement muscle symptom compare receive placebo , , secondarily , receive CoQ10 likely continue take statin medication .
DOC.criteria: Patients history muscle symptom ( ache , pain , cramp and/or weakness ) take statin drug persist least 2 week statin Plasma creatine kinase level > 3 time upper normal limit Liver enzymes , alanine transferase ( ALT ) aspartate transferase ( AST ) > 2 time upper normal limit Pregnancy breastfeeding ( contraindication statin use ) Severe renal impairment , define glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) < 30 ml/min/1.73 m2 Bleeding disorder , current use warfarin , international normalize ratio ( INR ) great 1.5 , platelet count le 100,000 mm3 Contraindication strength testing , include myocardial infarction , unstable angina , revascularization procedure within past six week , history brain aneurysm stroke Chest abdominal surgery within past six week Severe persistent pain related cause Unable complete selfadministered questionnaire , unable read converse English
